title: Cruel GC Day at Vuelta: Kuss Caught Up in Crash, Almeida Tumbles Off Podium
content:
The Portuguese rider slipped out of a virtual podium spot while defending champion Kuss ceded another minute: 'I got held up by the crash.'

Read the full article at Cruel GC Day at Vuelta: Kuss Caught Up in Crash, Almeida Tumbles Off Podium on Velo.
author: ahood
